document_data.name: Titys
document_data.mainbody: '''Titys''' was an old fence living in [[Hillsfar]] around [[1367 DR]].
document_data.Description: Titys was tall and had graying hair.
document_data.Activities: Titys owned [[Titys's Emporium]], which was a well-stocked general store, but he also ran a side business buying anything without question from [[adventurer]]s. He was a reliable source of information regarding anything about the [[Red Plumes]] or other aspects of the area.
